title: Grey-Mist granite counter-tops in Kitchen and Bathrooms.
posting_body: ['Sapphire Bay', '99 W Cedar Bayou Lynchburg', 'Rd, Baytown, TX, 77521', 'More unit details at:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 103', 'OR Text', '103', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text us.', 'WELCOME TO SAPPHIRE BAY', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 856 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Sapphire Bay lies just thirty minutes from downtown Houston and offers spacious apartments, ultramodern amenities, and unparalleled convenience.', 'Located in charming Baytown, Texas, Sapphire Bay features generously spaced one-, two-, and three-bedroom floor plans and state-of-the-art home amenities like plank-style wood flooring, large closets, and beautifully oversized terraces.', 'For recreation and leisure, community amenities are just as enticing and include a lounge pool with in-water tanning deck, outdoor kitchen with grilling stations, expansive dog park with puppy pool, and much more.', 'Unlike most Baytown apartments, Sapphire Bay also offers both garage and lot parking for over-sized vehicles.', 'We invite you to relax completely within our luxury apartments in Baytown, TX.', 'Whether you are searching for suburban charm or an alternative to nearby Houston apartments, discover your new home at Sapphire Bay.', 'Features', '- Large walk-in closets', '- Custom 42" smooth gray kitchen cabinetry', '- Sleek white subway tile backsplash', '- Antique gray plank style wood flooring throughout Living Spaces', '- Grey-Mist granite counter-tops in Kitchen and Bathrooms', '- Whirlpool Stainless Steel appliances', '- Single basin kitchen sink with goose-neck faucet and sprayer', '- 2" faux wood blinds', '- Cut Berber carpet in Bedrooms', '- Ceiling fans with overhead lighting in Living Room and Bedrooms', '- Oversize side-by-side Whirlpool refrigerator with water and ice dispenser', '*Please note: an asterisk * denotes that some amenities are only available in select units.', 'Community Amenities', '- Private poolside cabanas', '- Extended size garages and reserved parking for large vehicles available', '- Private yards on select units', '- Business Center with PC and Mac station', '- Outdoor kitchen with gas and charcoal grilling stations', '- 24-hour fully equipped fitness center with top-of-the-line Precor fitness equipment', '- 24-hour resident package lockers', '- 24-hour yoga and spin studio with Fitness On-Demand technology', '- Luxury lounge pool with in-water tanning deck', '- Clubhouse with large kitchen for entertaining', '- Limited access gated community with remote access', '- Covered parking options*', '- On-Site 24-hour emergency maintenance', '- Private attached and separate garages*', '- Direct access attached garages in select units', '- On-Site management', '- Pet grooming station', '- Expansive dog park with puppy pool', '- Courtyard fire pits with outdoor seating', 'Driving Directions', '99 W Cedar Bayou Lynchburg', 'Rd, Baytown, TX 77521', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats and Dogs allowed up to 60lbs.', 'Breed restrictions may apply.', 'qlt23PPJUj']
